title: Srila Prabhupada Japa Meditation | Chanting 108 Hare Krishna Mantras with soothing music
speaker: HDG Srila Prabhupada

segments.key_quote: Hare Krishna Krishna Krishna Hare Hare Hare Ram Hare Ram Ram Ram Hare Hare
segments.summary: The lecture consists primarily of the chanting of the Hare Krishna mantra.
